title: S16 Ep141: Requiem For A Friend: Remembering Tim Yancey
itunes:title: Requiem For A Friend: Remembering Tim Yancey
description:
Darkness Radio honors the life of our friend, Investigator and Radio Host, Tim Yancey, by featuring his appearance on Darkness Radio from 2008. 

On this episode, Tim talks about the Amityville Horror case and how he maintained a close relationship to George Lutz up until the time he died.  Tim recaps the case with us on this program and gives us George's unique perspective on how things happened.
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
dc:creator: Darkness Radio
